snippet.title: Joy Ride Turbo Trailer
snippet.description:
From the creators of Kinect Joy Ride comes the latest edition to the quirky kart genre -- Joy Ride Turbo, a controller-based arcade racer delivering precision handling and crazy stunts giving you more thrills, faster speeds, and bigger drifts! Experience the freedom and adventure of the open road in the all new Stunt Park, a vast, vibrant playground for your car where you
can jump off cliffs, shoot out of a cannon, and more. Explore the park's depths to collect trophies, car parts, and coins to unlock 42 vehicles, each with its own unique characteristics -- giving you the edge to show off death-defying tricks and race even faster. Plus, kart race with your friends and family in three modes of play. Race your friends in local 4-player split-screen or compete with up to 8 on Xbox LIVE. Check out the trailer for Joy Ride Turbo and start your engines on May 23rd!

ESRB Rating: EVERYONE (Mild Fantasy Violence)
